explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses a supervised-learning problem with a rejection option, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper explicitly mentions a 'supervised-learning problem with a rejection option,' indicating it is within the supervised learning paradigm.
explanations.classification: The paper deals with a classification problem, transforming an m-class classification problem to (m + 1)-class to include an abstention option.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions training neural networks in an end-to-end fashion to characterize the disconfidence of prediction.
explanations.deep learning: The paper involves training neural networks, which is a core aspect of deep learning.
